text: 6.12: Ga 2.3; 2.14; 5.11; Fi 3.18Nde mbarara. Mba nden foon zav kha tɨga havhargi gumgi, mbe khueŋ nzuav, mbe harigi gumgi nɨman mbe zɨ bakɨvi ndir zav maaŋ mbui. Mbe khueŋ ndɨkndɨgap rivgi. Mba Zudaiŋ muuŋv kɨv, mbe nza Krais rimgi khanarareŋ khothɨgap, nza fooi tɨva zɨn vui fhu, mbe ne mbararagi, ne nzerigi fhu. Mbe ne mbararagirga, mbe tɨva mbatɨgar nzan muunga.
